name: Cascadia9.0
description:
Soon (maybe tomorrow, maybe decades from now), the Pacific Northwest will be hit with another massive earthquake originating in the Cascadia Subduction Zone. Play as several characters to learn how to survive and thrive in this earth-shaking catastrophe!

This is the first of four games being developed by researchers at Lewis & Clark College in consultation with local disaster management experts and with funding from the National Science Foundation.
